description: Smallest number that takes n steps to reach 1 under iteration of sum-of-squares-of-digits map (= smallest "happy number" of height n).
references: Richard K. Guy, Unsolved Problems in Number Theory, Sect. E34. (2nd ed. UPINT2 = 1994, 3rd ed. UPINT3 = 2004)
links: Tianxin Cai & Xia Zhou, On The Heights of Happy Numbers, Rocky Mountain J. Math., Vol. 38, No. 6 (2008), 1921-1926.
H. G. Grundman, E. A. Teeple, Heights of happy numbers and cubic happy numbers, Fib Quart. 41 (4) (2003) 301
May Mei, Andrew Read-McFarland, Numbers and the Heights of their Happiness, arXiv:1511.01441 [math.NT], 2015.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
